Questions.Label: Does your organisation have any composition with creditors?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: Composition with creditors is an agreement between a debtor and its creditors where all the creditors agree to accept less than the original amount of debt due to them in full satisfaction of their claim.

FurtherQuestions.Label: Give us more information
FurtherQuestions.Hint:
You'll need to include:

  • a brief summary of the agreement
  • how your organisation will settle the debt
  • the date of when the debt will be fully paid off

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter more information

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 1500 characters or less

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell if your organisation has any composition with creditors

Questions.Label: Has your organisation failed to pay back funds in the last 3 years?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Tell us if your organisation has failed to repay Â£50,000 or more:

  • to ESFA or any other public body
  • under a subcontract to deliver education and training services funded by ESFA

FurtherQuestions.Label: Give us more information
FurtherQuestions.Hint:
You'll need to include:

  • a brief summary of why your organisation failed to repay funding
  • if any actions have been taken to resolve this

Questions.Label: Has your organisation had funding removed from any education bodies in the last 3 years?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This only includes funds removed by:

  • the Higher Education Funding Council for England (HEFCE)
  • the Office for Students (OfS)

FurtherQuestions.Label: Give us more information
FurtherQuestions.Hint:
You'll need to include a brief summary including:

  • why funding was removed
  • if any actions have been taken to resolve this

Questions.Label: Has your organisation been removed from any charity register?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:

  • the Charity Commission for Northern Ireland
  • the Office of the Scottish Charity Regulator

Questions.Label: Has your organisation or any of its partner organisations been subject to insolvency or winding up proceedings in the last 3 years?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
A partner organisation is an organisation who either:

  • shares the same UK ultimate parent company as your organisation - so they are part of the same group
  • has a legal contract with your organisation to deliver training

FurtherQuestions.Label: Give us more information
FurtherQuestions.Hint:
You'll need to include:

  • names of the other organisations
  • a brief summary of why this happened - including relevant dates
  • outstanding judgements or legal proceedings

Validations.Name: Required
